cards.rules_text:
First strike, Deathtouch
{3}, {T}, CT-9904, Crosshair deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
The Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Haste, Trample
Whenever CT-9903, Wrecker deals combat damage to a player, create that many tapped colorless artifact token named Meteorite with “When this token enters, it deals 2 damage to any target” and “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
Sacrifice a Meteorite: CT-9903, Wrecker deals 5 damage to any target. Activate only once each turn.
Bad Batch

{X}, {T}: Gain control of target artifact an opponent controls with mana value X or less.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Vigilance
{1}, {T}: Name a card. Target player reveals the top of their library. If the named card is revealed, exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any time can be spent to cast that spell.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Vigilance
Omega, of The Bad Batch has all activated abilities and keyword abilities of Clone-Trooper creatures that you control.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Persist [i](When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)[/i]
{U}, {T}: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. At the beginning of that player's next end step, they discard that card.
The Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Creatures you control are goaded.
Whenever another creature you control dies, you may reveal the top card of your library until you reveal a creature with the same creature type as it. Put that card into your hand, and the rest at the bottom of your library in a random order.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Flash, Vigilance
Obi-Wan Kenobi, Soresu Master costs {1} less for each creature attacking you or a planeswalker you control. 
When Obi-Wan Kenobi, Soresu Master enters the battlefield, it gains indestructible until the beginning of the next end step.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Flash, Reach, Trample, Indestructible
Protection from instants and sorceries
The Zillo Beast costs {1} less for each time a land has entered or left the graveyard this turn.

Vigilance
Whenever ARC Troopers attacks, up to one target creature has base power 1 until the end of combat.

Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Exile Brothers in Arms.

First strike, Haste
When Anakin Skywalker, Fallen dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]
Each other creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to target creature that player controls.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The remaining Jedi will be hunted down and defeated!” —Darth Sidious[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace, First strike
Double all damage Lord Vader would deal.
Whenever Lord Vader attacks, it gains Indestructible.

Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Exile Brothers in Arms.

[i]Join Forces [/i]— Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana.
Each opponent creates X 1/1 colorless B1-Battledroid artifact tokens with Assault, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way plus 1. [i](Creatures with Assault must attack if able and attacks you if able.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if each opponent does not control a creature named B1-Battledroid, exile The Clone Wars, then cast it transformed.
cards.notes: Flips into Rise of the First Galactic Empire

cards.rules_text: When Battle Brothers enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Clone Trooper creature token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Look around. We're one and the same. Same heart, same blood.” Fives[/i]

cards.rules_text: Christophsis enters the battlefield tapped. When Christophsis enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Christophsis.
Scarif enters the battlefield tapped. When Scarif enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Scarif.
Mustafar enters the battlefield tapped. When Mustafar enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Mustafar.
Kashyyyk enters the battlefield tapped. When Kashyyyk enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Kashyyyk.
Nal Hutta enters the battlefield tapped. When Nal Hutta enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Nal Hutta.
Crait enters the battlefield tapped. When Crait enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Crait.
Dagobah enters the battlefield tapped. When Dagobah enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Dagobah.
Bureau of Standards enters the battlefield tapped. When Bureau of Standards enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Bureau of Standards.
Onderon enters the battlefield tapped. When Onderon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Onderon.
Coruscant enters the battlefield tapped. When Coruscant enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent draw a card. If you do, untap Coruscant.

Enchanted vehicle is a creature.
R2-D2, Full of Solutions and enchanted vehicle gain +1/0 for each basic land among basic land types you control.

First strike, Haste
Whenever enchanted vehicle attacks, it gains the stats and keyword abilities of BB-8 and all creatures that pilot it.

Vigilance
Omega, of The Bad Batch has all activated abilities and keyword abilities of Clone-Trooper creatures that you control.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Squad {1} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
Your deck may include any number of B1-Battledroid Squadrons.

Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
When Clone-Trooper Squadron enters the battlefield, put a vigilance, first strike, or haste counter on each Clone-Trooper creature you control.

Squad {1}{R} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{R} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
When B2-Battledroid Squadron enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Your deck may include any number of B2-Battledroid Squadrons.

When Advanced ReConnaissance-170 enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Clone Trooper creature token.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When BX-Series Commando Droid enters the battlefield, name a nonland card. Target opponent reveals their hand. That player discards all cards with that name. If they can't you may tap target artifact or creature instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We are programmed for combat, clandestine infiltration and assassination.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Double strike
Coordinate: Whenever Ahsoka Tano, Padawan Learner deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]
Apprentice [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

cards.card_name: Rise of the First Galactic Empire
cards.rules_text: You get an emblem with “Whenever you would create a Clone Trooper creature token, create a 3/1 white Stormtrooper creature token with menace and intimidate instead.” [i](That creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)[/i]

Defender
[i]Live for One's People[/i] ― {T}: Remove target attacking creature from combat. Both you and its controller draw a card and gain 1 life.

Creatures your opponents control lose shroud and can't gain or have shroud.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Piloting {2}{U}{R} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Haste, Prowess
Enchanted vehicle has +1/+1, haste, and prowess.
Menace, Intimidate [i](This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)[/i]

Flying
When Low Altitude Assault Transport enters the battlefield, you may put a creature with power less than or equal Low Altitude Assault Transport's crew cost from your hand into the battlefield.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

First strike, Flying
BLT Y-Wing Starfighter can't block.
Whenever BLT Y-Wing Starfighter deals combat damage, it deals damage equal to the amount dealt to all creatures that player controls.

Whenever Droideka enters the battlefield or becomes untapped, put an indestructible counter on it.
Whenever Droideka becomes tapped, remove all indestructible counters on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Destroyers are blind from behind. A distraction combined with a rear assault will give you a kill. The trick is to get the right speed on the droid popper.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, transform Night's Mortis.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

When Day's Mortis enters the battlefield or transforms, choose a color.
At the beginning of your upkeep, transform Day's Mortis.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

Flying, Haste
When Hyena Bomber deals combat damage to a player, deal that much damage to target creature or planeswalker, then sacrifice it.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Vigilance
Whenever General Grevious, Lightsaber Collector defeats a creature with combat damage, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Equipment card. Put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
If General Grevious, Lightsaber Collector has at least 4 equipment cards attached to it, he gains double strike and menace.
Apprentice
Target creature you don't control may be attacked as if it were a player or planeswalker until the end of turn.

Vigilance
When Rex, 501st Captain enters the battlefield, create 2 2/2 white Clone-Trooper creature tokens.
Clone-Trooper creatures you control have Vigilance and “Coordinate: First strike.” [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]
Clone-Troopers you control have “Coordinate: Gain +1/+1.” [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We were cutting off this access point to the Undercity, when we engaged one of the leadership, Gar Saxon.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
When Clone Commando enters the battlefield, choose one of the following: 
• Clone Commando deals damage equal to its power to target creature.
• Target creature cannot attack or block as long as a creature named Clone Commando is on the battlefield.
• Put a first strike, reach, or trample counter on Clone Commando.

Flying, First strike
Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Prowess

Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Flying, Ward {4}
Vehicles you control are creatures.
When Lucrehulk-Class Battleship enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a vehicle card with mana value 2 or less and exile it. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
Sacrifice a vehicle: Lucrehulk-Class Battleship gains +2/+2 until the end of turn.

Flying
Whenever Munificent-Class Star Frigate is put into the graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it. If you do, exile target player's graveyard.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Flying, Menace
When Providence-Class Dreadnought enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact. If it was a vehicle, you may search your library for a vehicle card, reveal it, then put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When Trident-Class Assault Ship enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Trident-Class Assault Ship's owner creates two 1/1 colorless B1-Battledroid artifact creature tokens. 
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, if Ginivex-Class Fanblade Starfighter is untapped, sacrifice it.
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When Beak-Wing Fighter enters the battlefield, if its a creature, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature and all creatures you control that share a creature type with it gain flying and “Coordinate: +1/+1.” [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature and all creatures you control that share a creature type with it gain first strike and “Coordinate: Whenever this creature deals combat damage, put a +1/+1 counter it.” [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature and all creatures you control that share a creature type with it gain trample and “Coordinate: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.” [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature and all creatures you control that share a creature type with it gain vigilance and “Coordinate: Ward {2}” [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature and all creatures you control that share a creature type with it gain menace and “Coordinate: When this creature dies, draw a card and lose 1 life.” [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature and all creatures you control that share a creature type with it gain haste and “Coordinate: Whenever this creature attacks, it gains +2/0. [i](Gain this ability ability while you control 3 or more units.)[/i]

Haste, Fear
If a creature source would kill Darth Maul, Hate Fueled, instead exile Darth Maul, Hate Fueled and return it to the battlefield transformed, enchanting that creature or planeswalker.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Trample, Haste
If you control fewer creatures than the player with the most creatures, Monstrosity X, where X is equal to the difference. [i](If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)[/i]
When Savage Opress, The Monster becomes monstrous, up to X target creatures can't block this turn.
Apprentice [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Menace
Whenever Mace Windu, Party Crasher deals lethal damage to a creature during the combat step, untap all attacking creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Do this only once each turn.

Other Robots you control have “{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Draw a card and lose 1 life.”
Robots in your hand have: “Squad {2}” [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]

Whenever you pay any amount of mana for a Squad effect, add that much colorless mana to your mana pool.
If one or more tokens would be created under your control from a Squad effect, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.
Sacrifice a vehicle creature: Draw X cards, where X is the amount of damage that vehicle creature dealt this turn.
